press.title: SIGGRAPH Asia 2020 in Daegu, South Korea
press.bodyText: Conference Chair Jinny Hyejin Choo & SV Chair Juyeon Hong invites you to Daegu, South Korea for SIGGRAPH Asia 2020, one of the largest conference and exhibition for computer graphics and interactive techniques in the region. If you love animation, visual effects, emerging technologies in the CG industry, you've got to be at SIGGRAPH Asia 2020!
